parts.text: What is the capital of France?
The capital of France is **Paris**.
What is the sum of the first 50 prime numbers? Generate and run code for the calculation, and make sure you get all 50.

To find the sum of the first 50 prime numbers, I will generate prime numbers sequentially until I have collected 50 of them, and then I will sum them up.

Here's the Python code to perform this calculation:
The sum of the first 50 prime numbers is 5117.
What is the temperature in London?

functionDeclarations.name: get_current_temperature
functionDeclarations.description: Gets the current temperature for a given location.

location.description: The city name, e.g. San Francisco
